Uses of Class
Controller.User

    • Uses of User in Controller

      Methods in Controller that return User 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      User DataAccess.getUserByName(java.lang.String name)
      Finds User in database with corresponding name.
      User DataAccess.updateBalance(User user, int newBalance)
      Updates balance of User in database to newBalance
      Methods in Controller with parameters of type User 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<GetOrder> DataAccess.getOrders(User user)
      Fins the orders made by the User in the database and returns them
      void DataAccess.makeOrder(java.util.ArrayList<LineItem> li, User user)
      Adds the LineItems in arraylist li to database and makes a new order in database for the User
      void DataAccess.newAccount(User user)
      Creates a new user, and adds to database
      User DataAccess.updateBalance(User user, int newBalance)
      Updates balance of User in database to newBalance
